<h3 id="X39906">X(39906) = X(2)-OF-7th BROCARD TRIANGLE</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (b^2+c^2)*a^6-(b^4+3*b^2*c^2+c^4)*a^4-(b^2-c^2)^2*b^2*c^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(39906) = 2*X(182)+X(39910) = X(182)+2*X(39912) = X(39910)-4*X(39912)</b>
<p>X(39906) lies on these lines: {2,2782}, {30,568}, {39,37988}, {76,14096}, {98,37457}, {182,39910}, {184,1316}, {194,37190}, {237,11257}, {401,34396}, {427,1180}, {538,3917}, {566,7668}, {1899,2549}, {2450,5254}, {2790,6776}, {2979,32515}, {3094,20021}, {3095,14957}, {3148,39646}, {3410,9996}, {5063,9512}, {5112,13567}, {5422,35930}, {7739,11205}, {8584,11594}, {9755,35941}, {10169,14836}, {10796,34545}, {11007,26913}, {11442,37242}, {13351,34845}, {14880,37183}, {14912,32428}, {18335,36163}, {21531,32448}, {26881,37906}, {32429,36213}</p>
<p>
X(39906) = {X(182), X(39912)}-harmonic conjugate of X(39910)<br>
</p>
